column2: cutpoint_a_lobes <- ggplot(dados_lobos_v1, aes(x = K_corrected, color = Diagnostic, fill = Diagnostic, alpha = 0.4))+
geom_vline(data = cpK, aes(xintercept = optimal_cutpoint, linetype = "dashed", group= subgroup)) +
geom_vline(data = cpK_MCI, aes(xintercept = optimal_cutpoint, linetype = "dotted", group= subgroup)) +
cutpoint_b_lobes <- ggplot(dados_lobos_v1, aes(x = logAvgThickness, color = Diagnostic, fill = Diagnostic, alpha = 0.4))+
geom_vline(data = cpT, aes(xintercept = optimal_cutpoint, linetype = "dashed", group= subgroup)) +
geom_vline(data = cpT_MCI, aes(xintercept = optimal_cutpoint, linetype = "dotted", group= subgroup)) +
fig_cutpoint_lobes <- ggarrange(cutpoint_a_lobes, cutpoint_b_lobes, labels = c("A", "B"),  ncol = 1, font.label = list(size = 11), common.legend = TRUE, legend = "top")
